parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Mission Information
</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Time

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current in-game time in hours. For a formatted version of time, see [[BIS_fnc_timeToString]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[daytime]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - day time using a 24 hour clock, using fractions of hours.
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[daytime]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns 16.5 given it is 16:30 (4.30pm) in game</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Get hour, minute, seconds:
<code>[[private]] _daytime = [[daytime]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>assuming [[daytime]] returns 1.66046</value></part></template>
[[private]] _hours = [[floor]] _daytime;											<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value> 1</value></part></template>
[[private]] _minutes = [[floor]] ((_daytime - _hours) * 60);						<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>39</value></part></template>
[[private]] _seconds = [[floor]] ((((_daytime - _hours) * 60) - _minutes) * 60);	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>37</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Returns the current <u>local</u> ingame time in hours.

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[date]], [[dateToNumber]], [[BIS_fnc_timeToString]], [[time]], [[skipTime]], [[systemTime]], [[systemTimeUTC]]
</value></part></template>
